item.title: About Me
item.author: lpranaukumar@gmail.com (Pranau Kumar)
item.description: Hi, I’m Pranau. I’m a third-year CS student at Vellore Institute of Technology, India. I love programming and playing Civilization (just one more turn!!). I code in the language that helps me get the job done. Usually, more often than not, that language is Python. Having been involved with a rusty ol’ PC from a young age, I love tinkering with computers and gadgets - customizing them, improving them (or breaking them).
